item.title: Research
item.description: Here will be a summary of my research projects. This will include links to my papers: http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.animal.2021.100253 http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.applanim.2021.105494 http://dx.doi.org/10.1371/journal.pntd.0007012 http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.prevetmed.2021.105501 https://doi.org/10.1016/j.prevetmed.2019.104726 http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.prevetmed.2018.05.006 And a link to my Google Scholar profile.
